sp_instance_link.title: Reportar Bug

sys_update_version.name: sp_instance_link_0da379a3839022109566f7b6feaad390
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_instance_link"><sp_instance_link action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><class_name/><color/><css>/* Estilizar o círculo externo */
.icon-circle {
    background-color: #3498DB; /* Cor do círculo */
    border-radius: 50%; /* Formato circular */
    width: 60px; /* Tamanho do círculo */
    height: 60px; /* Tamanho do círculo */
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: background-color 0.3s ease; /* Transição suave */
}

/* Alterar a cor ao passar o mouse */
.icon-circle:hover {
    background-color: #2980B9; /* Azul mais escuro */
}

/* Estilizar o glyph (ícone interno) */
.icon-circle .fa,
.icon-circle .fas {
    color: #FFFFFF; /* Cor do glyph */
    font-size: 24px; /* Tamanho do ícone */
    transition: color 0.3s ease; /* Transição suave */
}

/* Alterar a cor do glyph ao passar o mouse */
.icon-circle:hover .fa,
.icon-circle:hover .fas {
    color: #FFD700; /* Dourado */
}</css><glyph>bug</glyph><id/><kb_article/><kb_category/><kb_topic/><order>1</order><roles/><sc_cat_item display_value="Bug Report">d9d9d5de839022109566f7b6feaad330</sc_cat_item><sc_category/><short_description/><size>md</size><sp_column display_value="1">6caa29df839422109566f7b6feaad354</sp_column><sp_page display_value="sc_cat_item">9f12251147132100ba13a5554ee490f4</sp_page><sp_widget display_value="Icon Link">3caa67afcb13020000f8d856634c9c2e</sp_widget><sys_class_name>sp_instance_link</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-03-21 12:29:40</sys_created_on><sys_id>0da379a3839022109566f7b6feaad390</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Reportar Bug</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Mock SkillUp" source="x_1523172_skill_up">6938717783b712109566f7b6feaad3b9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Mock SkillUp">6938717783b712109566f7b6feaad3b9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_instance_link_0da379a3839022109566f7b6feaad390</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-03-21 12:45:56</sys_updated_on><title>Reportar Bug</title><type>sc_cat_item</type><url/><widget_parameters><![CDATA[{
